resources.string: Metronome is a simple metronome app that is designed to be easy to use and look nice. To keep this app free to use without ads and support the development of other apps like it, please consider making a donation using the button below.
Special thanks to Kevin Aguilar for making this app\'s icon. Kevin Aguilar is the founder of 221 Pixels, a design service that specializes in iconography and user interfaces.
A fast and easy to use plug-and-play dynamic theme engine. Powered by Rx, for Android apps.
Do you want to add this shortcut to your home screen?
Network error: couldn\'t get purchase data.

This app is completely free to download and use, and it contains absolutely no advertisements. However, this means that I need another method of making a profit. In order to allow me to keep making great (and most importantly, free) apps like this one, please consider buying the \'pro key\' using the button below. This dialog does not limit the functionality of this app; you can press \'use anyway\' to ignore this message and continue using the app as normal. Buying the pro key will remove these dialogs.
An image loading and caching library for Android focused on smooth scrolling.
A beautiful, fluid, and customizable dialogs API.
